names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Radix Ampelopsis Brevipedunculatae Vitis Wilonae Veitch (She Pu Tao Gen)

action.primary: Clears Heat, detoxifies, expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, disperses stasis, disperses extravasated Blood, dissipates nodules and reduces swelling

indications: Inflammations, pulmonary abscess, traumatic injury, scalds, scrofula, rheumatic arthritis, sores and boils, acute appendicitis and toxic swellings

notes: This is is used to treat cancers.
This herb is also known as She Pu Tao Gen.
